Ben Chambers MBA, BSc, MRICS.

Qualified as a chartered surveyor in 1995, and worked for Gooch & Wagstagg, Nelson Bakewell Gooh Wbster and Fineman Ross predominately in Investment Agency.

Joined Great Portland Estate Pls in 2002 from Fineman Ross as an Investment Manager and was promoted to Investment Director and onto the 4 persons GPE

Ben Chambers MBA, BSc, MRICS.

Qualified as a chartered surveyor in 1995, and worked for Gooch & Wagstagg, Nelson Bakewell Gooh Wbster and Fineman Ross predominately in Investment Agency.

Joined Great Portland Estate Pls in 2002 from Fineman Ross as an Investment Manager and was promoted to Investment Director and onto the 4 persons GPE

Ben Chambers

Neil Thomson

neil.thompson@dartriverlondon.com

Ben Chambers

ben.chambers@dartriverlondon.com

In dicam luptatu velim te omnis patriotique.

Both served on GPE’s 4 member Executive Committee, Neil as Executive Director and Ben as Investment Director, with Neil also on the plc Board.

Prior to GPE, Neil was Investment Surveyor with Derwent Valley (now Derwent London plc) and Ben was an Investment Agent with Fineman Ross and Gooch Webster.

The core management has significant experience  as Investing Principals; undertaking close to 100 transactions, across 60 projects, creating and executing some of London’s most exciting and lucrative asset strategies over the last 20 years.
